title: Peter Thiel, Progress, and Religion as the JPEG of BEING
description:
Peter Thiel is Eric Weinstein's friend and boss and there is obviously a lot of trade between them in terms of ideas. Thiel was recently with Eric Metaxas at Socrates in the City and talked about Progress. The video is well worth watching. This is not an indepth treatment of that video but rather a revisiting of the subject of how we know the good and therefore how we might imagine we can know what progress is. 

Peter Thiel Eric Metaxas Zero to One https://youtu.be/SO_00POR-Po
Zero to One https://amzn.to/3eSir5x
Sevilla King Quality Experience https://youtu.be/4XEPiYw_N0E
Weinstein and Schmachtenberger Search for Fullness https://youtu.be/4bzwv7mzzCc
Eric and Bret Weinstein and the End of History https://youtu.be/xkuw8dDAThA
Eric Weinstein Playlist https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VoN1YN2VX2g&list=PLYSXopxC8Z9uHSPwJfvP_jro-3yeBrw3J
GK Chesterton Heretics https://amzn.to/2yIKjZ4
Jordan Peterson Sam Harris A-Priori Structure https://youtu.be/LwWKjdLjtIA
Jordan Peterson Maps of Meaning 2017 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I8Xc2_FtpHI&list=PL22J3VaeABQAT-0aSPq-OKOpQlHyR4k5h
Rebel Wisdom Conspiracy Pandemic Vervaeke https://youtu.be/1P8pLXYT44U
Douthat the Decadent Society https://amzn.to/3cBPg4z
Life, Death and Undeath American Comics https://youtu.be/l6ocLYr6hk4
Postmodernism is Dead Edward Docx http://www.prospectmagazine.co.uk/magazine/postmodernism-is-dead-va-exhibition-age-of-authenticism
Rod Dreher Pilgrims vs Tourists https://www.theamericanconservative.com/dreher/pilgrims-vs-tourists-zygmunt-bauman/
Chesterton Everlasting Man https://amzn.to/2VvF2xb
